casebody.data:
Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Scuro.

[Cite as Disciplinary Counsel v. Scuro (1988), 40 Ohio St. 3d 607.]

(No. D.D. 87-24 Submitted December 20, 1988 Decided December 30, 1988. )

The application for reinstatement is granted. Joseph E. Scuro, Jr. is reinstated to the practice of law in the state of Ohio.

(For earlier case, see [1988], 36 Ohio St. 3d 205, 522 N.E. 2d 572.)

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, Holmes, Douglas, Wright and H. Brown, JJ., concur,
